1.title: Personal and Professional Qualities of a Professional

chapters.1: Read the following words paying attention to the pronunciation. \n
chapters.2: Professionalism [pra'fel(a)n(a)iz(a)m], satisfaction [sætis' fakf(a)n], expectation [ekspek'ter/(a)n], attribute [ætribjut), competence [kompit(a)ns), conscientiousness [kon/tenfesnas], integrity [in'tegriti], appropriateness [a'praupriatnas], awkwardness ['o:kwadnas].
